sub_title: Passionate about building teams and projects for causes that matter! Always learning, growing, and looking for new experiences
summary:
I have more than 7 years of experience in planning, project management, coordination, building teams, executing, and monitoring communication strategies for several organisations spanning sectors such as Technology, DEI, Humanities, Culture, and Arts. 

I began my professional career in this sector with the Alliance Francaise Network in India, where I held the position of Cultural and Communication Coordinator. Over the years I have had the opportunity to work with international teams such as TransforME Now, WorldPride and EuroGames, Institut Francais Network in France and South Asia as well as have created national and international projects such as Deconfine - South Asian Digital Arts Festival, Waters of Change, several concert tours in India, Boomerang Eco-Festival to name few. The Deconfine Festival in particular was nominated as the highlight for two years by Institut Francais de Paris with its collaborations spanning over 8 countries with numerous creators, artists and organisations.

About the festival:
Using video, audio, A.I., image, Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality, and text, the artists and creators featured in the festival represent a diverse body of work reflective of the rapid proliferation of digital culture in South Asia and around the world.

The 2021 edition of <de>confine was presented by Institut Francais (Paris), the French Embassy in India, the French Institute in India, Alliance Francaise in India, the French Embassy in Pakistan, Alliance Francaise in Pakistan, French Embassy in Sri Lanka, Alliance Francaise de Kotte - Sri Lanka, Alliance Francaise in Dhaka, Alliance Francaise in Katmandou and the Lahore Digital Arts Festival.

It was supported by Asia-Europe Foundation, AVAH Collective, Samdani Art Foundation, The Victoria Memorial Museum, Terrain.
